dialogues.speaker: sheep
text: Hello there! The smell of coffee is lovely today.

dialogues.speaker: sheep
text: What would you recommend for me to taste today?
On a day like this, a refreshing Mathy Latte is the best!
이런 날씨에는 역시 시원한 매쓰리카노가 최고죠!
How about a sweet and chewy Mathcaron?

dialogues.speaker: sheep
answer: Hahaha, indeed, something cool is the best~
It's so chewy, I hope my teeth don't come out!
너무 쫀득해서 내 이빨이 나가지는 않겠는가?
How did you know I love fruits! Hahaha
내가 과일 좋아하는 건 어떻게 알고! 하하하

dialogues.speaker: sheep
text: I'll go with this one for today!
